content: Black Myth: Wukong has a selection of Gourd Soaks you can equip that offers an additional buff to your Gourd. This buff can change how you use it, offering a boost to your attack, elemental resistance, as well as providing boosts to your overall health. Additionally, some of the Soaks have the ability to give your spells extra damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Soaks.md', within the main section titled 'Soaks'.
The content is as follows:
Black Myth: Wukong has a selection of Gourd Soaks you can equip that offers an additional buff to your Gourd. This buff can change how you use it, offering a boost to your attack, elemental resistance, as well as providing boosts to your overall health. Additionally, some of the Soaks have the ability to give your spells extra damage.
